mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.password, s.name, s.email, s.phone, s.address, s.detailAddress, s.createDate, s.updateDate, s.bussinessNumber, s.farmName, s.reviewCount, s.status FROM seller s WHERE s.id= #{id}
select count(userId) from seller where userId = '${userId}'
select count(*) from seller where sellerId = #{sellerId} and status = #{status}
select count(*) from seller where categoryId = #{cid}
select * from seller order by id desc
select * from seller where sellerId = '${sellerId}' order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into seller (userId, password, name, email, phone, address, detailAddress, createDate, bussinessNumber, farmName, status) values (#{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, now(), #{bussinessNumber}, #{farmName}, '0')
mapper.update: update seller set userId = #{userId}, password = #{password}, address = #{address}, email= #{email}, phone = #{phone}, detailAddress = #{detailAddress}, updateDate = now(), farmName = #{farmName} where id = #{id}
